item.title: Reanimal Has Officially Gone Gold Two Months Before Release
item.content:encoded:
Reanimal is officially ready for launch. Publisher THQ Nordic has announced that the upcoming horror game has gone gold two months ahead of its February release.

The announcement came via a media release and social media post on Tuesday.

“Co-op horror adventure Reanimal from Tarsier Studios, the creators of Little Nightmares I and II, has officially gone gold,” the publisher said. “THQ Nordic has confirmed that the game is now complete and on track for a cross-platform launch on Nintendo Switch 2™, PC, PlayStation®5, and Xbox Series X|S on Friday, February 13th, 2026!”

Reanimal going gold signals that, aside from anything major happening, the game won’t be delayed past it’s launch date. Obviously, anything can happen so it’s not a 0% chance, but it’s a bet worth making.

As mentioned above, Reanimal will be available on current gen consoles and PC. The standard edition of the game retails for $39.99. If you want a bit more, you can pick up the Digital Deluxe version for $59.99, which comes with a copy of the game, its season pass for all three chapters of DLC, and exclusive Foxhead and Muttonhead masks.

Want even more, the $199.99 Collector’s Edition comes with everything in the Digital Deluxe edition of the game along with the pre-order DLC, a PVC Pig Statue, metal key ring, a map poster, an 80-page hardcover artbook, three sticker sheets and a “high-quality collector’s box”.

If you aren’t sure if Reanimal is a game for you, there is a demo available now to download.

item.title: New Divinity Will Feature Turn-Based and Co-Op Gameplay, Developers Confirm
item.content:encoded:
Larian has confirmed that the upcoming Divinity game will be a turn-based title with co-op gameplay.

For those unaware, during The Game Awards 2025, Larian came with a surprise announcement for a new Divinity game, after saying that there were no current plans for Divinity: Original Sin 3. Days after the reveal, the developers have finally arrived with answers to the many questions players might have about the game.

Fans of Baldur’s Gate 3 Will like Divinity

During a new interview with The Gamer, Larian Studios founder Swen Vincke confirmed that Divinity will feature turn-based gameplay and multiplayer. Vincke first spoke about the criticism against Baldur’s Gate 3, stating that many players felt that it was Divinity Original Sin 3 as a lot of the DNA was brought to the title. However, if players liked Baldur’s Gate 3, they will enjoy this one as well, as “it’s a turn-based RPG”, and it’s got co-op multiplayer.

That clears the confusion about Divinity’s gameplay style, which many players were curious about after dropping the ‘Original Sin’ from the title. Now, players want to see how developers will innovate in the turn-based genre, without incorporating Dungeons & Dragons rules. They have the Original Sin series’s gameplay structure to fall back on, but it will be exciting to see how they can improve on that.

In other news, Divinity Original Sin 2 has received a free current-gen update for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch 2. item.title: Today’s Wordle #1642: Hints and Answer for December 17, 2025
item.content:encoded:
Wordle challenges players to guess a fresh five-letter word each day in six tries or fewer. Whether you’re a beginner or a daily player, today’s tips and strategies can help you solve it faster and maintain your streak—if you’re open to a little extra help. So, if you’ve found yourself stuck with today’s Wordle, don’t worry, below you’ll find some helpful hints and even the answer for Wordle Game #1642 for December 17, 2025.

To play today’s Wordle, head to the game’s website. If you want to go right to today’s answer without any tips or tricks, you can click right here.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s and yesterday’s editions of Wordle. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players have to guess a five-letter word answer in no more than six attempts. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct, but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a popular online trend.

Wordle can only be played on the New York Times website. There is currently no app for you to download the official game.

Wordle Hints For Today, December 17, 2025

The Wordle answer for game #1642 should be pretty easy for most players. According to the NY Times Wordle review, today’s answer takes an average of 4 of 6 guesses. That makes the exact same as the 4-guess average from December 16.

General Wordle Hints For December 17

Without giving today’s Wordle answer completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: This word contains only one vowel
  • Hint 2: Two of the letters in this word are the same.
  • Hint 3: Rearranging the letters creates another common word with a very different use.
  • Hint 4: This word can describe something natural, but also appears in sports and slang contexts.

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1642 for December 17, 2025

Starter Words For December 17, 2025

If you want help getting started without having today’s Wordle answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you figure out some included letters. A few starter words that may help are:

  • CRASH
  • SUGAR
  • GRASP

Today’s Wordle Answer For Game #1642 On December 17, 2025

If you’ve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answer to today’s Wordle below.

Answer: GRASS

If you solved today’s Wordle without our answer, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow’s puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

What Does Today’s Wordle Answer Mean?

Plead is a noun that means, “any plant of the family Gramineae, having jointed stems, sheathing leaves, and seedlike grains.”

When Is The Next Wordle Game After #1642?

Wordle games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before to give players a heads up. The game on December 18 will be Wordle Game #1643.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily word puzzle created by Josh Wardle. Initially developed as a prototype in 2013, it wasn’t fully released until 2021. The game challenges players to guess a five-letter word in six tries or fewer, using hints from each attempt to narrow down the answer. Its straightforward concept, accessibility, and the thrill of solving a new puzzle each day helped it surge in popularity by late 2021. The success of Wordle inspired numerous spin-offs and social media challenges, leading to its acquisition by The New York Times in early 2022.

item.title: Bully Online Mod is Now Live in Early Access
item.content:encoded:
The highly anticipated Bully Online mod is now live with over 60 mini games, role play, free roam, custom vehicles, and much more.

The Bully Online is a highly popular mod announced back in October, led by the known YouTuber SWEGTA. We had some idea about what to expect from this mod, with things like races, clique battles, first-person shooter arenas, boxing matches, and more teased. Now, we have the exact details.

Bully Online Mod is Available to Download Now

As revealed through SWEGTA’s new YouTube video, the Bully Online mod is now live in early access with 60+ minigames, roleplay, freeroam, custom vehicles, restored beta content, map improvements, and easter eggs have been added. The mod has been released as an open-source project, allowing anyone in the community to contribute and ensuring it won’t be taken down.

The Bully Online mod will be continually developed and improved. At the moment, players can join servers, choose a character, earn money through the games, and then buy more characters. Players should eventually be able to buy houses, vehicles, and more.

How to Download Bully Online?

Check out the steps below to learn how to download the Bully Online mod on your PC.

  • Players need to have Bully v1.200 installed without mods, and it shouldn’t be a pirated copy of the game.
  • Then, players should download the latest version of derpy’s script loader and drag the ASI file into the game’s folder. The player should also ensure they have an ASI loader installed (such as dinput8.dll from Ultimate ASI Loader).
  • The players should download the latest Bully Online Launcher Pack from this website.
  • Players will also have to create an account on the website and then connect to swegta.com using the launcher.
  • Players can only use mods that change files in the World.img / World.dir and TXD folder. Apart from that, SilentPatchBully, One Percent Better Project, and focus.asi are the only other accepted mods. If any other mods are found, the player risks being banned.

In other news, Rockstar has stated that fired employees were leaking game features. Will you download the Bully Online mod? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

item.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Sea of Sorrow DLC Release Period, Explained
item.content:encoded:
The wait for Hollow Knight: Silksong was excruciating, but everyone is hoping the Sea of Sorrow DLC release doesn’t take years. This guide has the latest on the expansion’s release period and more.

Hollow Knight: Silksong finally rewarded everyone in 2025. The breathtaking Metroidvania challenged the patience of many, but piqued the interest of millions. The indie title has won awards, recouped millions in sales, and Team Cherry has already revealed the game’s first expansion.

As long as things go to plan, the wait won’t be anywhere near as long, which would be the Team Cherry on top of the game.

When Is Hollow Knight: Silksong Sea of Sorrow DLC Releasing?

Team Cherry has told everyone to expect the Hollow Knight: Silksong Sea of Sorrow DLC in 2026 and won’t disclose any further details until then.

Insider Gaming wishes it had more news—as the team is looking forward to more Silksong content just as much as you—but developer Team Cherry is likely aware of the pressure that comes with the release date for new Hollow Knight content.

Silksong descending into limbo for years was painful for everyone. It must have been just as torturous for Team Cherry, knowing the developer probably wanted to just release the content and end everyone’s wait. The wait ended up being worth it, and Silksong is one of 2025’s Game of the Year contenders.

This means there’s even more pressure on Sea of Sorrows (and any subsequent DLC) to be just as good. Don’t be alarmed at the sight of the word, but if the content ends up being bigger than Team Cherry plans (like Silksong), a delay to 2027 may not be out of the question.

So keep your hopes in check until further notice.

Hollow Knight: Silksong Sea of Sorrow DLC Price & What To Expect

The Sea of Sorrow DLC is a free expansion for Hollow Knight: Silksong owners and comes as part of the full package, and the content looks to be “nautically” themed.

To be clear, Team Cherry could easily have charged money for whatever expansion or new content was coming the game’s way. Sea of Sorrow will do no such thing. It’s a free expansion and adds even greater value to Silksong’s already alluring and generous price tag.

Check out the dev’s official words on the content:

“New areas, bosses, tools, and more! Hornet’s adventures continue in our nautically themed expansion, coming free for all players next year.”

Here’s the Sea of Sorrow DLC trailer.

Are you prepared to wait as long as it takes for Sea of Sorrows? Has Team Cherry earned the right to take its time with all content? The Insider Gaming Discord Server is where you can share your thoughts on the new DLC and Silksong in general.
